ai-atk-abh03a43:1_1: now having taught the roots according to the profitable roots - in the profitable senses as taught, and the elements of in the sense fields, It is the comprehension of the elements,
ai-atk-abh03a43:1_2: Herein, the detailed explanation of the base consisting of boundless space in this way is said in the Paṭisambhidā.
ai-atk-abh03a43:1_3: Herein, although the three (story) came from (?), the three great sages, the birds, the good states came to an end. As they died at each time, they came together with the mendicants.
ai-atk-abh03a43:1_4: And herein, although questioning the progressive method of the form elements in the interior elements,
ai-atk-abh03a43:1_5: But here the multiplicators of the four elements are more very helpful to the Yamakas, festering grounds, and so on.
ai-atk-abh03a43:1_6: Herein, the eye elements should be understood in the way already described. The Sineru, the meaning of the Enlightened One’s explanation is the meaning of the way already stated.
ai-atk-abh03a43:1_7: Because of that’s exactly the meaning and for its sake.
ai-atk-abh03a43:1_8: but he is completely understood it.
